title: Tales of Monkey Island Complete Pack
notes: After a few seconds the mouse stops to work. It's only possible to move the mouse if a mouse key is pressed down (right or left). Works with workaround from https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/204.

title: Tales of Monkey Island: Chapter 1 - Launch of the Screaming Narwhal
notes: PLAYED FIRST 20 MINUTES OF GAME, NO SIGNS OF ANY ISSUES
No problems. Some screen transitions/loads use 1-3 seconds longer than windows.
